Posts.Content: Jul 24, 2012 06:44AM sammy0345 wrote: My husband started chemo on July 11th and di great the first couple days except for the reflux/heartburn but then on day 3/4 extreme bone and muscle pain, got that under control but day 6 got a bowel infection and spent 5 days isolation in the hospital with severe diarrhea, vomitting and pain.....hopefully the next one goes smoother.
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo July 2012 teeballmom SusanHG123
